definition: a piece of cutlery with a shallow bowl-shaped container and a handle, snuggle and lie in a position where one person faces the back of the others
details:
noun
- a piece of cutlery with a shallow bowl-shaped container and a handle
- formerly a golfing wood with an elevated face
- as much as a spoon will hold
= example: as much as a spoon will hold
= synonyms: spoonful
verb
- snuggle and lie in a position where one person faces the back of the others
= synonyms: smooch
- scoop up or take up with a spoon
= example: scoop up or take up with a spoon
